full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SDOM GSUM BSLAB BYA RIN PO CHE'I PHRENG BA BSKAL BZANG MGUL RGYAN CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015A *, ,(CES SDOM GSUM BSLAB BYA RIN PO CHE'I PHRENG BA SKAL BZANG MGUL RGYAN CES BYA BA 'DI NI, DPAL LDAN SMAD RGYUD GRVA TSANG GI GRVA RIGS SNGAGS RAMS PA SBYIN PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS NYIN ZHAG PHRUGS RER THUN DRUG TU SDOM GSUM GYI BSLAB BYA RNAMS LA BSNGO BGRANG BYA TSUL 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG DU NAN CHEN POS BSKUL ZHING, RANG DANG SKAL BA MNYAM PA GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN DU RE BA DANG, RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS GANGS RI'I KHROD 'DIR RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO SDOM GSUM GYI BSLAB BYA RNAMS RGYAL BA RANG NYID KYI DGONGS PA JI BZHIN DU GSAL BAR MDZAD PA'I LUGS BZANG 'DI NYID SLAR YANG CHES CHER 'PHEL NA CIM RUNG SNYAM DU SMON PAS, ,DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTA GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO 'DI NYID 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
